summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Westlake Boulevard, in the City of Seattle, from Denny Way to Mercer Street, by the construction of wooden sidewalks on both sides thereof, in accordance with Resolution No. 1110 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Immediate Payment," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
